p: Electrophoresis was performed at 25 V and 300 mA for 30 min. After electrophoresis, alkali neutralization in gels was performed by rinsing twice with a neutralizing buffer (0.4 M Tris, pH 7.5) for 10 min, and then with distilled water. After rinsing, the comet was stained and visualized with fluorescent dye-ethidium bromide solution (20 Î¼g/L). After staining (15 min), the plates were ready for analysis.
